entry.title: Heavy Rain Watch
entry.summary: Periods of heavy rain. Rainfall amounts may approach warning criteria within 15 km east of the main divide. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Moderate.

entry.title: Road Snowfall Warning
entry.summary: Snow showers expected to continue this morning, then clear this afternoon. Another 3 to 6 cm may accumulate near the summit, with lesser amounts down to 700 metres. Further snow is likely Overnight tonight into Tuesday morning when another 5 to 8 cm may settle on the road.
